reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. SCHOLZ v. DIST. COURT OF 13TH JUD. DIST., 124 Mont. 611 (1950)

caption.center: STATE OF MONTANA EX REL. CHARLES J. SCHOLZ, RELATOR, v. DISTRICT COURT OF
THIRTEENTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT, YELLOWSTONE COUNTY, and the HONORABLE GUY C.

opinion.attorneys: Ralph J. Anderson, Helena, for relator.
opinion.opinion_text: Original proceeding. Application for writ of supervisory control to the district court of Yellowstone county, Honorable Guy C. Derry, judge presiding, seeking to annul an order setting aside a default. On authority of Nelson v. Lennon, 122 Mont. 506,206 P.2d 556; Patterson v. Patterson, 120 Mont. 127,179 P.2d 536; and Davis v. Hubbard, 120 Mont. 45,179 P.2d 533, the writ is denied.
